description: Start with Y(0)=0, X(1)=1, Y(1)=2. For n > 1, choose least positive integers Y(n) > X(n) such that neither Y(n) nor X(n) appear in {Y(k), 1 <= k < n} or {X(k), 1 <= k < n} and such that Y(n)-X(n) does not appear in {Y(k)-X(k), 1 <= k < n} or {Y(k)+X(k), 1 <= k < n}; sequence gives Y(n) (for X(n) see A140100).
